message: Starting critique review - gathering phase handover and task findings
Reviewing research deliverables - examining extracted content quality and completeness
Core deliverables verified - examining explanation problems analysis and clinical examples catalog
All deliverables analyzed - preparing senior developer critique with architectural assessment

Senior developer critique complete. Analyzed all 6 deliverable files (schizophrenia spectrum details, personality disorders details, ADHD guidelines, explanation problems analysis, clinical examples catalog, question themes). Found exceptional research quality: all phase deliverables fully satisfied with professional-grade documentation. Key strength: ADHD-friendly guidelines with 4-step mechanism template sets up Phase 2 for success. Main recommendation: Deploy 4-5 parallel writing agents in Phase 2 to handle large scope (70+ explanation rewrites) efficiently. No blocking issues. Submitted 10 observations (8 architectural insights, 2 praise items) with 5 actionable recommendations for next phase.
